sorting_g.description: Reorder the phrases below with what you consider the best at the top.

drag.tip: Drag and drop these phrases and rank them in order from top to bottom.

tap.tip: Tap these phrases in order to rank them from top to bottom

password_request.instructions: Enter the email address you used when you set up your account. We will then email you a link to a secure page where you can create a new password.
password_request.message: We have sent you an email to {email}. Please check your mailbox. If you don't get an email please check your spam mail folder and settings.

password_reset.instructions: Create your new CCR3 password. You will be asked for this password the next time you book cheap flights or log into your account.
password_reset.success_message: Your password has been successfully changed.

request_reset_password_title: Enter your email address below and we will get in touch with instructions on how to reset your password
password_successfully_changed: Your new password has successfully been changed
please_register: If you are already registered, please {signIn}. Otherwise please use our quick registration form.
not_found_message: Sorry, we couldn't find what you were looking for.
ready_to_start_dp_survey_part: You are now ready to start part {nextPartNumber} of this 3 part questionnaire
survey_completed_heading: Thank you, we have received your questionnaire.
survey_has_already_passed: You have already completed this questionnaire.

eq.title: E.Q. - Emotional Intelligence
eq.confirm_to_next_section:
You are seeing this message because either:

You have decided not to complete the ranking of ALL 18 statements which is important if you are to benefit from the findings of this questionnaire and you may fail the process you are involved in.

Or

You have ranked All 18 statements as you see it.

If you believe that the ranking you have made on ALL 18 statements are correct for you, then simply confirm this below.

ipulse.title: Ipulse
ipulse.comment_description:
Thank you for completing the questionnaire. If you want, you can add an optional comment about what you feel would help in making things better. This
          can be to stop something, start something or do something in a different way. Your comments are confidential and all comments will be considered
